humans.name: Aragorn
humans.affiliation: Fellowship of the Ring, King of Gondor
quotes: I am Aragorn son of Arathorn; and am called Elessar, the Elfstone, Dunedain, Ranger of the North.
There is no other way. We shall see it done, though it cost us our lives.

tools.name: Andúril
tools.description: The reforged sword of Elendil, known as the Flame of the West, symbolizing Aragorn's claim to the throne.

tools.name: Ranger's Gear
tools.description: Includes a cloak and other survival equipment used by Aragorn during his time as a Ranger.

humans.background_story: Aragorn is a skilled ranger and the rightful heir to the throne of Gondor. He plays a key role in the War of the Ring, leading the armies of men and uniting the kingdoms of Gondor and Rohan against Sauron.

appearance.description: Aragorn has a rugged appearance, often wearing practical clothing suited for travel. He carries the sword Andúril and has a commanding presence.

humans.name: Boromir
quotes: One does not simply walk into Mordor.
I would have gone with you to the end, into the very fires of Mordor.

tools.name: Heron-marked Sword
tools.description: A sword with a distinctive heron-mark, symbolizing Boromir's high rank and his dedication.

tools.name: Shield of Gondor
tools.description: A shield bearing the emblem of Gondor, used by Boromir in battle.

humans.background_story: Boromir is a valiant warrior from Gondor who joins the Fellowship of the Ring. He is driven by his desire to protect his city but struggles with the temptation of the One Ring.

appearance.description: Boromir is a tall, strong warrior with a noble bearing. He wears armor and carries his distinctive sword and shield.

humans.name: Faramir
humans.affiliation: Ranger of Gondor, Captain of Gondor
quotes: I do not wish to risk my life for any treasure or my own gain.
The world is indeed full of peril, and in it there are many dark places.

tools.name: Ranger's Gear
tools.description: Includes cloak and other survival equipment used by Faramir as a Ranger.

tools.name: Faramir's Sword
tools.description: A sword carried by Faramir, symbolizing his leadership and bravery.

humans.background_story: Faramir is the younger brother of Boromir and a noble ranger of Gondor. He is a wise and honorable leader who plays a key role in defending his city and aiding Frodo and Sam.

appearance.description: Faramir is a rugged and capable ranger, often dressed in practical gear suited for wilderness survival. He carries a sword symbolic of his leadership.

humans.name: Denethor
quotes: I will not give way to the shadow of fear.
Gondor is not all of Middle-earth, but it is the last hope.

tools.name: Steward's Sceptre
tools.description: A symbol of the authority of the Stewards of Gondor.

tools.name: Denethor's Palantír
tools.description: A seeing-stone used by Denethor to communicate with Sauron and view distant events.

humans.background_story: Denethor is the Steward of Gondor and the father of Boromir and Faramir. He is a powerful leader who becomes increasingly consumed by despair and paranoia.

appearance.description: Denethor is an authoritative figure often seen in formal robes and carrying his sceptre. His appearance reflects his high status and the burdens of leadership.

humans.name: Eowyn
quotes: I will not risk my life for any treasure or my own gain.

tools.name: Sword of Rohan
tools.description: A sword used by Éowyn in battle, symbolizing her strength and courage.

tools.name: Shield of Rohan
tools.description: A shield bearing the emblem of Rohan, used by Éowyn in combat.

humans.background_story: Éowyn is a courageous shieldmaiden of Rohan who defies traditional roles to fight in battle. She plays a crucial role in the defense of Rohan and confronts the Witch-king of Angmar.

appearance.description: Éowyn is often seen in battle armor, symbolizing her role as a warrior. Her appearance reflects her strength and determination.

humans.name: Eomer
humans.affiliation: Rider of Rohan, King of Rohan
quotes: The world is indeed full of peril, and in it there are many dark places.

tools.name: Rohan Sword
tools.description: A sword used by Éomer, known for its effectiveness in battle.

tools.name: Rohan Armor
tools.description: Sturdy armor worn by Éomer, crafted for protection in battle.

humans.background_story: Éomer is the leader of the Riders of Rohan and the brother of Éowyn. He is a formidable warrior who plays a key role in the defense of Rohan and the overall fight against Sauron.

appearance.description: Éomer is seen in Rohan armor, reflecting his role as a leader of the Riders. His appearance is both commanding and practical for combat.

humans.name: Théoden
quotes: I will not leave my people to the shadow of despair.

tools.name: Théoden's Sword
tools.description: A sword used by Théoden, symbolizing his leadership and valor.

tools.name: Rohan Crown
tools.description: A crown worn by Théoden, representing his kingship over Rohan.

humans.background_story: Théoden is the King of Rohan, a wise and courageous leader who plays a crucial role in the defense of his kingdom against Sauron's forces.

appearance.description: Théoden is often depicted in regal armor and bearing his crown, symbolizing his status as king and his readiness for battle.

humans.name: Isildur
quotes: I am Isildur, Lord of Gondor.
This is the One Ring, the ring of power!

tools.name: Elendil's Sword
tools.description: The sword used by Isildur, a powerful weapon that once belonged to his father, Elendil.

tools.name: The One Ring
tools.description: The powerful ring forged by Sauron, which Isildur claimed after the Dark Lord's defeat.

humans.background_story: Isildur was a prominent king of Gondor who played a crucial role in the defeat of Sauron. However, he kept the One Ring for himself, which ultimately led to his downfall.

appearance.description: Isildur is often depicted in regal attire befitting his status as king, wielding the sword of his father and holding the One Ring.

humans.name: Bard the Bowman
quotes: I will kill the dragon, and bring peace to my people.
The people of Lake-town are not without courage.

tools.name: Black Arrow
tools.description: A legendary arrow used by Bard to slay Smaug the Dragon.

tools.name: Bow of Bard
tools.description: A bow used by Bard, renowned for its accuracy and power.

humans.background_story: Bard the Bowman is a hero from Lake-town who is renowned for slaying the dragon Smaug. His actions lead to the reclaiming of the Lonely Mountain and the restoration of peace.

appearance.description: Bard is often depicted with his bow and the Black Arrow. His appearance reflects his status as a hero and skilled archer.
